details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.9 Annotations - 8.9.2.4 Annotation types - Ink annotation
details.description: A Contents entry describing the author’s intent shall be provided for Ink annotation

rule.description: A Contents entry describing the author’s intent shall be provided for Ink annotation

error.message: Ink annotation does not contain Contents entry
